channel.title: Portforwarding Help please
channel.description:
Ok So I successfully port forwarded. (Checked using the port checker tool) But i think something maybe wrong because my server is only letting people who are connected to my network connect my server. Does anyone know how I can make it to were everyone can connect? Any and all help is appreciated.
-Thanks Zukyak

item.title: Portforwarding Help please
item.dc:creator: @jamespk jamespk
item.description:
@jamespk wrote:

if you havn’t already u may need to add the port into your fire wall to let others connect put the server port 43594 or 5555 (or anything u used) into it heres step’s:::

control panel
windows fire wall
exceptions
add port
any name and your port number
put it for TCP and a new one for UDP
and it should let people connect
make sure the box’s for server are ticked

i hope that helped you with your server

Read full topic
